PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE - Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS

CAREER SUMMARY
Apr 2015 to date AECOM Middle East Limited, United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar
Jan 2022 to date
Position: Human Resources Business Partner – Middle East
Duties & Responsibilities:
Support the Business in Managing & Delivering HR services:
Consult and strategize with business leaders on employee, managerial, organizational and business issues, while effectively utilizing HR tools
Review and update HR policies and procedures in compliance with local Labor Law
Participate in and rollout global strategic initiatives related to employee diversity, career development, succession planning etc.
Establish, develop and maintain strong relationships with business partners and management to gain an understanding and knowledge of business requirements
Manage HR disciplinary issues and offer practical solutions, including but not limited to development plans, coaching etc.
Investigate a variety of employee-related issues, incidents, complains and inquiries
Support management in retention and succession planning
Ensure compliance requirements are met to manage and mitigate potential risks to the Business
Manage the development, implementation and effective delivery of a variety of HR programs including but not limited to onboarding, employee training, compensation programs, employee relations, performance management, organizational changes, conflict mediation and resolution
Advise the business on strategic plans, budgets, goals and outcomes
Foster a cohesive team and promote a positive work environment that encourages innovation and collaboration
Strategize and manage annual compensation planning cycle, including but not limited to running a full staff talent review, handling business alignment sessions, managing budget breakdown and supporting managers in year end conversations.
Oct 2020 to Dec 2021
Position: Senior Advisor – Human Resources Operations
Duties & Responsibilities:
Support the Business in Managing & Delivering HR services:
Establish and run resource management unit for internal staff
Manage employee exit and transfer process
Support employees and managers in adapting to changes in the business and shifts in the workplace environment
Maintain close contact with employees through regular HR visits to multiple sites and offices in the region
Support HRBP in compensation planning cycle
Support HRBP in the performance management process including performance appraisals, salary adjustments, and career progression plans
Assist with the development of and realization of strategic plans, budgets, goals and outcomes
May 2018 to Oct 2020
Position: Advisor – Human Resources Operations
Duties & Responsibilities:
Provide advice to the Business, management team and employees
Help managers understand and proactively address HR disciplinary issues
Support HRBP in disciplinary matters and career development plans
Assist in the exit formalities and process to ensure a smooth transition out of the business
Jan 2017 to April 2018
Talent Acquisition Coordinator
Duties & Responsibilities:
Source, prescreen, arrange interviews and coordinate between hiring managers and possible
candidates
Meet hiring managers on weekly basis to discuss progress of roles and candidate status
Complete the full recruitment life cycle from inception to completion
May 2016 to Dec 2016
Position: Human Resources Shared Services and Talent Acquisition Admin
Duties & Responsibilities:
Track, organize and review candidate and new hire paperwork
Assist Talent Acquisition on various projects as needed, including AGRS testing, employee
recruitment and mobilization
Apr 2015 to May2016
Position: Human Resources Shared Services Admin
Duties & Responsibilities:
Administer and produce employment offers for all new candidates for AECOM-KSA
Draft, edit and track HR correspondence related to employees’ life cycle
Support Shared Services on various project as needed
Produce process maps for HR functions
Sept 2013 to Feb 2014 The American University of Cairo, Egypt
Position: Research & Teaching Assistant: Dr. Bahgat Korany
Duties & Responsibilities:
Edit Arab Human Development Report
Report on various topics of international relations theory
Lead graduate and undergraduate classroom discussions and guide students through
assignments, presentations and examinations.
Oct 2011 to May 2012) SocialEyez Media Company; Amman, Jordan
Position: Media Analyst and Researcher: Political Unit
Duties & Responsibilities:
Analyze, report and translate social media outlets for interactions of laymen and analyzing people’s sentiment toward socio-political issues.
COMMENT
Experienced human resource manager with expertise in industrial relations as well as overall management skills including staff management & project leadership.
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk
